thread.section_title: Red Wall Garden Hotel - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (Beijing, China) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: 10 days
thread.title_full: 10 days - Review of Red Wall Garden Hotel, Beijing, China - TripAdvisor

author: mjr117
title: 10 days
text: I don't think most visitors will take 10 nights in one hotel but we did and it was fine overall however the first day for us we wanted to try their food and there's one girl working there was extremely rude in my opinion cuz when we order one pot of tea and one dish to snack on she gave us that look like " three and only this order ? " and she was talking to her workmates and staring at us and that made me angry ..I asked for her name and she said why ? ...I asked again and said it's just for rating the service and she did give me ..first day after a long trip no one want to see that so work on it Red Wall
